name: 黃琮昇
objective:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
The objective of this course is to teach students how to do research and write technical papers. And the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work before graduation. Each student must select the topics of special project under professor's instructions. Personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issue the paper to get the grade and credits.
schedule:
1. Read papers, technical reports, and other reading materials
2. Learn and operate instruments and get familiar with experimental and simulation environments
3. Simulate and implement the course progress
4. Report and discuss the course progress
5. Write weekly reports and technical reports
scorePolicy: The students are evaluated based on their weekly reports, technical reports, and attendance rates.
materials: Papers, technical reports, and other reading materials.
remarks: In response to Covid-19, the teaching contents and the grading/assessments may be adjusted, and the course will be offered online.(The link will be posted in Taipei Tech i-School Plus)
